name: Psych-DS Example Dataset
description: This is a 'skeleton' dataset for Psych-DS
citation: Kline (2018). Not a real paper, No Journal, p. 1-24.

variableMeasured.name: participant_id
variableMeasured.description: Identity of each zebra. Provides a unique rowid in this dataset.

variableMeasured.name: length_in_smoots
variableMeasured.description: The length of a zebra, in smoots

variableMeasured.name: milliseconds
variableMeasured.description: Time the zebra started running before/after the starting gun goes off

variableMeasured.name: team
variableMeasured.description: Which team the zebra is on
